FIELD.NAME: ATTRIBUTE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the type of Database Attributes to be returned. (1: Limit sets, 2: Text conversion, 3: Calibration Curve, 4: Short Description, 5: Long Description, 6: List of All Mnemonics

FIELD.NAME: PDB-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Project Data Base version to be used by the responder if multiple project databases are supported. Defaults to the most recent PDB version.

FIELD.NAME: PROD-DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the product in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: PROD-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Product type and subtype being requested. (See Table 4-21. Product Categories... Value is TAC: Telemetry and Command)

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-PROD-SUBTYPES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of further delineations / categories beyond the product subtype. Also, used as msg subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. in Product Message. Value in the range of 1+.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: PROD-SUBTYPE.n.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: First subcategory of the product subtype. (Subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. of the Product Message)

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: URI
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Location where the requesting component is asking for the product file(s) to be stored. Could be a web address, directory or folder specification

FIELD.NAME: NAME-PATTERN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the name of the output file

FIELD.NAME: DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the file in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the version of the file

FIELD.NAME: SIZE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum size of the file acceptable to the requester. Size specified in KB.

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-MNEMONICS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Total Number of mnemonics being requested

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields
